data.name: XDataPilotDescriptor
desc: provides access to the layout settings of a data pilot table.
This interface extends the interface com.sun.star.container.XNamed which provides access to the name of the data pilot table used e.g. in collections.

methods.name: getColumnFields
desc: returns the collection of the data pilot fields used as column fields.

methods.name: getDataFields
desc: returns the collection of the data pilot fields used as data fields.

methods.name: getDataPilotFields
desc: returns the collection of all the data pilot fields.

methods.name: getFilterDescriptor
desc: returns the filter descriptor specifying which data from the source cell range are used for the data pilot table.

methods.name: getHiddenFields
desc: returns the collection of the data pilot fields not used as column, row, page, or data fields.

methods.name: getPageFields
desc: returns the collection of the data pilot fields used as page fields.

methods.name: getRowFields
desc: returns the collection of the data pilot fields used as row fields.

methods.name: getSourceRange
desc: returns the cell range containing the data for the data pilot table.

methods.name: getTag
desc: returns an additional string stored in the data pilot table.

methods.name: setSourceRange
desc: sets the cell range containing the data for the data pilot table.

methods.name: setTag
desc: sets an additional string stored in the data pilot table.
